data.message: I wrote to you about my friend who unblocked me but we still can't get on one anothers page. I told her, but she said she unblocked me. I don't have her blocked so what's going on??  Is this a problem you can help us with?

replies.message: Hey Wes. Whenever you unblock someone, this will not automatically add the person back to your friends list. If you want to become friends with this person again, you'll need to send them a new friend request: https://www.facebook.com/help/146466588759199. Hope this helps! -Hailey
Halley if they unblock me then I could at least see their page. or find them here on face book without sending them a friends request. I can't do either, nor can she.
Guess I'll have to ask her again if she did.  Thanks Monica.

That's because technically if your still blocked by that person sadly she is the only one who can unblock you... Sorry to tell you that truth but she knows it! She'll also need to send you a friend request or visa versa

Janet Caraballo I just got though talking to her on the phone and she swears she unblocked me. We are thinking it's has something to do with face book. We want to be face book friends again but it's impossible now... THANKS TO FB WE CAN'T!!!!!
Wes she just didn't wanna hurt your feelings.  Girls will lie to keep from doing that.  Face it honey....she never unlocked you.  Move on
